entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Join on OpenJson primitive collections #32407
  • Table splitting: Support mapping to the same table/column as another entity/entity's property. #32406
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold runs successfully but does not create any models or update existing models #32405
  • Compex types inconsistencies?: Record struct vs record for Requrired and ComplexType attribute, how to deal with Default values? #32404
  • Error " nu1202: package dotnet-ef 8.0.0 is not compatible with net7.0 (.netcoreapp,version=v7.0)" pop up when use command "dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef" to install dotnet ef tools in Dev 17.7.7 or lower version #32403
  • Update on foreign key relation on a read only scenario #32402

Closed

  • EF8 SQL: "Incorrect syntax near the keyword 'WITH'." when joining tables with list.Contains in Where #32400
